mapper.select: SELECT ser.ID AS userId,pro.PROJECT_BACKGROUND AS projectBackground,pro.PROJECT_NAME AS projectName,pro.PROJECT_CODE AS projectCode,pro.PROJECT_SCHEDULE_STATUS AS status,pro.PROJECT_STATUS AS projectStatus,pro.DEVELOPMENT_MODE AS developmentMode,pro.PROJECT_CLASS AS projectType,pro.PLAN_START_DATE AS planStartDate,pro.PLAN_END_DATE AS planEndDate,pro.BUDGET_NUMBER AS budgetNumber,ser.USER_NAME AS userName FROM tbl_project_info pro LEFT JOIN tbl_user_info ser ON ser.ID = pro.MANAGER_USER_ID WHERE pro.ID = #{id}

SELECT DISTINCT sys.SYSTEM_NAME AS systemName FROM tbl_project_system ps LEFT JOIN tbl_project_info pro ON ps.PROJECT_ID = pro.ID LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info sys ON ps.SYSTEM_ID = sys.ID WHERE ps.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND ps.RELATION_TYPE = 2 AND ps.STATUS = 1 AND pro.STATUS = 1 AND sys.STATUS = 1

SELECT DISTINCT userinfo.ID AS id,userinfo.USER_NAME AS userName FROM tbl_project_group pro LEFT JOIN tbl_project_group_user user ON pro.ID = user.PROJECT_GROUP_ID LEFT JOIN tbl_user_info userinfo ON userinfo.ID = user.USER_ID WHERE pro.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND pro.STATUS = 1 AND user.STATUS = 1 AND userinfo.STATUS = 1 AND userinfo.USER_NAME IS NOT NULL
SELECT REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_STATUS AS requirementFeatureStatus,COUNT(*) AS count FROM tbl_requirement_feature WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND STATUS =1 GROUP BY REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_STATUS DESC
SELECT VALUE_NAME AS valueName, VALUE_CODE AS valueCode FROM TBL_DATA_DIC WHERE TERM_NAME = '开发任务状态' AND STATUS = 1 ORDER BY VALUE_SEQ

SELECT req.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_STATUS AS requirementFeatureStatus,count(*) AS count FROM tbl_sprint_info spr LEFT JOIN tbl_requirement_feature req ON spr.ID = req.SPRINT_ID WHERE spr.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND req.STATUS = 1 AND spr.STATUS =1 AND #{currentDate} >= spr.SPRINT_START_DATE AND #{currentDate} <= spr.SPRINT_END_DATE GROUP BY req.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_STATUS

SELECT req.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_STATUS AS requirementFeatureStatus,count(*) AS count FROM tbl_sprint_info spr LEFT JOIN tbl_requirement_feature req ON spr.ID = req.SPRINT_ID WHERE spr.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND spr.SPRINT_START_DATE > #{currentDate} AND req.STATUS = 1 AND spr.STATUS =1 GROUP BY req.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_STATUS
SELECT COUNT(*) AS outStandingNumber FROM tbl_risk_info WHERE STATUS = 1 AND PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND RISK_STATUS IN(1,3)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS confirmationNumber FROM tbl_project_change_info WHERE STATUS = 1 AND PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND CHANGE_STATUS NOT IN(5,6)

SELECT DISTINCT tic.NOTICE_CONTENT AS noticeContent,tic.CREATE_DATE AS createDate,tic.ID AS id FROM tbl_notice_info tic LEFT JOIN tbl_project_notice pro ON tic.ID = pro.NOTICE_ID WHERE pro.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND #{currentDate} >= tic.START_TIME AND #{currentDate} <= tic.END_TIME AND tic.STATUS =1 AND pro.STATUS=1

SELECT PROJECT_ID AS projectId,PLAN_NAME AS planName,PLAN_START_DATE AS planStartDate,PLAN_END_DATE AS planEndDate,PLAN_SCHEDULE AS currentProgress FROM tbl_project_plan WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND STATUS = 1 AND PLAN_START_MILESTONE = 1

SELECT PROJECT_ID AS projectId,PLAN_NAME AS planName,PLAN_START_DATE AS planStartDate,PLAN_END_DATE AS planEndDate,PLAN_SCHEDULE AS currentProgress FROM tbl_project_plan WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND STATUS = 1 AND PLAN_END_MILESTONE = 1

SELECT DISTINCT ID AS sprintId,SPRINT_START_DATE AS planNewStartDate ,SPRINT_END_DATE AS planNewEndDate FROM tbl_sprint_info WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND #{currentDate} >= SPRINT_START_DATE AND #{currentDate} <= SPRINT_END_DATE AND STATUS =1

SELECT SUM(req.ESTIMATE_WORKLOAD) AS estimateWorkload,DATE_FORMAT(req.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS createDate FROM tbl_sprint_info spr LEFT JOIN tbl_requirement_feature req ON spr.ID = req.SPRINT_ID WHERE spr.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND req.STATUS = 1 AND spr.STATUS =1 AND #{currentDate} >= spr.SPRINT_START_DATE AND #{currentDate} <= spr.SPRINT_END_DATE GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(req.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT ID AS menuButtonId,MENU_BUTTON_NAME AS menuButtonName,URL AS url FROM tbl_menu_button_info WHERE url = #{url} AND STATUS =1

SELECT DISTINCT ps.SYSTEM_ID AS systemId,sys.SYSTEM_NAME AS interactedSystem,sys.SYSTEM_CODE AS systemCode FROM tbl_project_system ps LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info sys ON ps.SYSTEM_ID = sys.ID LEFT JOIN tbl_project_info pro ON ps.PROJECT_ID = pro.ID WHERE pro.ID = #{projectId} AND ps.STATUS = 1 AND sys.STATUS = 1 AND ps.RELATION_TYPE = 1
